entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
